titles.title: A resolution congratulating Graceland on the occasion of its designation as a National Historic Landmark.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/27/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes Graceland (the home of Elvis Presley from 1957 through 1977) as exceptionally valuable for promoting and illustrating the contributions of Elvis Presley to the music and popular culture of the United States. Acknowledges the importance of designating Graceland as a National Historic Landmark for the purposes of recognizing and preserving that unique cultural attraction. Congratulates Graceland on the occasion of its designation as a National Historic Landmark.
